name: emerged!
description:
Unfortunately I have to start with a warning

Some testers reported, that the browser version did not start up correctly on their PC. If you encounter problems or a black screen, please use the downloadable windows version!
No installer required, just unpack the zip and start.

Sorry for the inconvenience!
Cheers, Grisgram

The Team

Coding by Grisgram (itch.io profile link). You can also see my other projects here at github. I am also known as @Haerion on various platforms.

Play testing, sound sampling and additional graphics done by Celaistara (itch.io profile link).

Development time: Roughly 40 hrs.
Tools used: blender, GameMaker Studio, gml-raptor platform
Assets used: All assets are licensed, see credits in game, most of the graphcis are handmade.

How to play

emerged! is not a match-3, it is a merge-3 game!

Try to achieve highest possible score by merging 3 or more dice of the same value to increase their value up to the 6.

With every 6 reached, you unlock a vault for the color of the die. 

Unlock all vaults and create a final super-combo to win the game but watch the time!
Your score decreases over time, so be fast!

A game about dice...

...but as we only had 48 hours to complete the game, together with lots of dice, there may also be some tiny (but not cute!) little insects packed into the game. Bugs!
Yes, there may be bugs. I have seen so many of them (and terminated dozens over dozens!) in the past 48 hours, I put insect spray on my shopping list!

May the bugs NOT be with you!

GameMaker Studio and gml-raptor

This game has been created for the GMTK Game Jam 2022 with GameMaker Studio and my own gml-raptor platform.

Only roughly 1000 Lines of Code were necessary for this game with that platform!
You may contact me any time if you want to learn more about the raptor!
I do my best to answer all questions and will help, where I can.

Cheers,
Grisgram & Celaistara
